content:
Basic-cli 0.7 is here https://github.com/roc-lang/basic-cli/releases/tag/0.7.0
All tests so far are good, going to do a little more before I label it an official release.
Make sure that you are using today's nightly with basic-cli 0.7.0
Further tests were good, it's now marked as the latest official release.
I'm going to update the tutorial snippets to 0.7

I'm going to update the tutorial snippets to 0.7

I'm not going to get to this today, someone else is welcome to try. The tasks and backpassing sections require pretty big changes because the Stdin.line success type has changed. Stdin.line is now not really a good fit anymore to aid in explaining. Utc.now could be used, but I don't love it.
